attributes.action: Prevent any increases to Income Tax / National Insurance.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to find an alternative means of paying for increased pressure on the NHS / social care brought on by an ageing society instead of increasing the already heavy burden on working age people.
attributes.background: It has been rumoured that the Government wants to increase National Insurance contributions by between 1 - 2%, however, it is not acceptable that working age people are further taxed to support the wealthiest age group in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596266
